mapper.select: select itemid, itemcode, propertyfeecode, lastttime, currenttime, operater, waterfee, introduce from cpms.tb_propertyfee where itemid = #{itemid}
select itemid, itemcode, propertyfeecode, lastttime, currenttime, operater, waterfee, introduce from cpms.tb_propertyfee limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into cpms.tb_propertyfee(propertyfeecode, lastttime, currenttime, operater, waterfee, introduce) values (#{propertyfeecode}, #{lastttime}, #{currenttime}, #{operater}, #{waterfee}, #{introduce})
mapper.update:
update cpms.tb_propertyfee
propertyfeecode = #{propertyfeecode},
lastttime = #{lastttime},
currenttime = #{currenttime},
operater = #{operater},
waterfee = #{waterfee},
introduce = #{introduce},
where itemid = #{itemid}
